name: Lichess- pokemon gen 2 sprite chess peices
description:
Shiny=Black nonshiny=White. 

Mewtwo=Queen

Fortress=rook

Alakazam=bishop

Rapidash=knight

rattata=pawns

lugia/ho-oh=kings

To change sprites, go into style and edit style by uploading a 300x300 transparent background sprite of your choosing
